targets.expr: sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"})

sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"})

sum by (container) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload", invalid=$workloadSum})

avg by (container) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload", invalid=$workloadAvg})

max by (container) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload", invalid=$workloadAvg})

sum by (workload_type, workload) (avg_over_time(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload"})

sum by (workload_type, workload) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"}[$__range]) * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload"})

sum by (workload_type, workload) (avg_over_time(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) / on(cluster, namespace, pod, container) kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload"})

sum by (workload_type, workload) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"}[$__range]) * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload"})

sum by (workload_type, workload) (avg_over_time(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) / on(cluster, namespace, pod, container) kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload"})

sum by (container) (container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload"})

sum by (container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload"})

avg by (container) (container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"} / on(cluster, namespace, pod, container) group_left kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload"})

sum by (container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload"})

avg by (container) (container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"} / on(cluster, namespace, pod, container) group_left kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload"})

sum by (container) (container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload"})

options.content:
- Raw usage = RSS + Cache
- RSS is actually allocated memory
- Cache = Active + Inactive file
- WSS = Raw usage - Inactive file = RSS + Active file

What to look for:
- WSS reaching limit causes file garbage collection
- RSS reaching limit causes OOM

targets.expr:
# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (container) (max by(cluster, namespace, pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])) * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload", invalid=$workloadSum})

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
avg by (container) (max by(cluster, namespace, pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])) * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload", invalid=$workloadAvg})

list.definition: query_result(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload"})

list.name: container

query.query: query_result(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"} * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload="$workload"})
